original_text: And Jonathan called David, and Jonathan shewed him all those things. And Jonathan brought David to Saul, and he was in his presence, as in times past.
korean_text: 요나단이 다윗을 불러 그 모든 일을 그에게 알리고 요나단이 그를 사울에게로 인도하니 그가 사울 앞에 전과 같이 있었더라

sentences.original_text: and Jonathan shewed him all those things
sentences.korean_translation: 요나단은 그에게 그 모든 것을 보였다

sentences.original_text: And Jonathan brought David to Saul
and he was in his presence
